dt: {bc}not in agreement with popular fashions {bc}deliberately or emphatically not {d_link|fashionable|fashionable:1}

dt.t: She examines the adoption of {wi}anti-fashionable{/wi} clothing, the bloomer, as appropriate attire for that activity.

shortdef: not in agreement with popular fashions : deliberately or emphatically not fashionable
